column5: The best bed ever! en-suite with private entrance in new town home within walking distance of downtown. 24/7 private entrance & outside courtyard featuring built in BBQ with seating. The room includes a queen bed, dedicated dining/workspace, private bathroom, mini-fridge with freezer, microwave, Keurig, Smart TV with access via smarthub button, WiFi with codes in the information book in the room.
column8: Large En-Suite with private entry, courtyard, bbq
